chapters.title: Chapter 41: A Threat
chapters.info: Demira Eriff, p. 536 (754)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. Part of Salidar's embassy to Rand. She only spoke of two things: meeting Rand, and seeing the school he had started. In her eyes, no one who had started a school or a library or any other institution of knowledge could possibly be all bad. She grew up in Arad Doman.
